akn:section.akn:heading: Authority of the Comptroller General of the United States

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 300111. Authority of the Comptroller General of the United States The Comptroller General of the United States is authorized to review the corporation’s involvement in any Federal program or activity the Government carries out under law. (Added Pub. L. 110–26, § 11(a), May 11, 2007, 121 Stat. 109.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 300111 was renumbered section 300113 of this title.
